ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: You get your pet at 34 not 30......you get Charm Animal at 29 but those are not really to be trusted. ... From: killerspd To:
ygData.messageBody:
You get your pet at 34 not 30......you get Charm Animal at 29 but those are not really to be trusted.

----- Original Message -----
From: killerspd
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, September 12, 2002 2:50 PM
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: Greetings


Hello Fellow Norrathians,

I am a Barbarian Shaman, on the Druzzil Ro server in my 21st season.
Im currently looking to buy WIS gear for me. Ive started to use this
server as healers and casters only. Id like to buy wis gear that can
get me up to level 50 ish or so. Even though you arent on the server
Im on. The name and stats of the items that you own or have owned
plus the estimated value of said items, would prove very helpfull. If
thou art on my server, send me a tell, to the name of Odraneol. I
also have yet to apply a surname to myself. please help in my search.
and ill always pay it forward with the newbies on my server. Im
usually bound in Greater Faydark, and I hunt in Unrest. And will
continue to do so until, i ding 30 and get my pet. please remember
this, live long and prosper.


Odraneol
21st Level
Barbarian Shaman
Shadows of Conquest
Druzzil Ro

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "John" <kamorm@i...> wrote:
> Hail,
>
> I have been at this stoopid game for close to 3 years. My crowning
> achievement so far (150 days played, cause I love to 'smell the
> flowers') is lvl 60 epiced shaman with complete spellbook
> (no 'Ancient Scrolls' yet) and 25 AA pts. Even after playing EQ for
> this amount of time there is so much I am unfamiliar with, mostly
the
> old world, feel like newbie often :)
>
> I do however have humble knowledge of the Barbarian Shaman class,
the
> continent of Antonica and many of the kunark and velious zones. I
> hang out mostly in luclin zones atm. I belong to a smallish guild
(60
> members) that I have been in for 2 years (since early 30's) we are
> just now approaching some of the higher end encounters.
>
> I know I will learn from you folks and hopefully be able to
> contribute in some humble manner.
>
> Kamorm Winterstalker
> Oralce of Coinfist
> Innoruuk Server
